subject: p19016834
History: -year-old male with a history of esophageal cancer, status post esophagectomy via a right thoracotomy, now with cough after left-sided thoracentesis.
Findings: A right-sided Port-A-Cath tip sits in the lower portion of the SVC. The heart and mediastinal contours are within normal limits. The lungs are largely clear with only minimal atelectasis in the right base in accordance with a small right pleural effusion. There is no pneumothorax.
Impression: Small right pleural effusion with associated atelectasis no pneumothorax.
